body.name: 3Pack Phone 15 14 USB C Charger Block [MFi Certified], iGENJUN 20W Dual Port QC + PD 3.0 Power Adapter Wall Charger Fast Plug Charging Brick for Phone 15/14/13 Pro, Pixel, Samsung Galaxy - White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 27 mins
features: Smart Double USB Port Design: With both a USB-C port and a USB-A port, you can charge up to 2 devices simultaneously. Minimize waiting time and frees you from messy chargers with various interfaces.

Power Delivery Fast Charging: The USB-C port supports a maximum power output of 20W. iGENJUN USB C Charger Offers fast and efficient charging up to 3 times faster than a 5W charger. Charge your Phone 15 14 up to 60% capacity in just 30 minutes with the original cable.

Safe & Reliable: Equipped with a smart chip, which can adjust the input power of the phone to prevent the phone from overcharging and overheating. The USB C wall charger provides multi protections against over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and short-circuit. Keep your device safe and ensure safer charging overnight.

Universal Compatibility: 3 Pack type C charger block matches all USB A and USB C cable cords. Like Phone 15/15 Plus/15 Pro/15 Pro Max, Phone 14/14 Plus/14 Pro/14 Pro Max, Phone 13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/SE, Phone 12/12 Pro/XS Max/XR/X/8/7/6/6s, Samsung Galaxy, Android, LG, Nexus, HTC and more devices.

What You Get: 3 pack Dual-port (PD USB C 3.0 & USB A) phone charger block (White). If you have any questions, please feel free to contact, We will answer and solve the problem for you within 24 hours!
body.description: 3Pack iGENJUN 20W Durable Dual Port QC+PD 3.0 charger block fast charging Safe wall plug with Full Protection Smart IC technology to protect it from high-voltage and heat temperature, ensure safety when charging your device. 20w usb-c power adapter Fast power delivery 20w charger, 3x faster charging effeciency with minimum size. A time-saving charger when you are in a hurry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap price, Fast delivery, Reliable block.
reviews.reviewText: Forgot my Charging blocks at the last house I was staying at, so I had to order new ones. These came fast enough that my phone didn't even completely die, and they were even cheaper than my last blocks. They work just as well- and have an extra port to plug something else in to boot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super convenient charger!
reviews.reviewText: This charger is super convenient. With so many cords moving to USB-C, I think we all have needed to buy a block/will need one in the future. This one is nice because it has both the new USB-C as well as the old rectangular USB that all of our old cords used. So whatever charger you may have, this block will do the trick for you. At a very reasonable $3.33 per block, this is a great value for a future-proof product. Not to mention, they actually work and charge quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable chargers that work great for multiple devices.
reviews.reviewText: These three charger blocks are great. I bought the three-pack and have one in the kitchen, another in the family room and the 3rd one in my bedroom. I included a picture of one of these fast charging my Samsung Android phone and my wife's iPhone. I use the USB-C port on mine to charge my phone and drone batteries, while I use the USB-A port to charge many of my devices with a USB-B Micro port. These are very versatile, inexpensive and fast charge with the 20w output.

reviews.reviewerName: Good audio quality in general, great audio for the price, my issue is that the RGB is out of sync and you can't change the colours or turn them off.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't stay in outlet very well
reviews.reviewText: It's very loose in the outlet, but charges my phone good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing and great for the price. It has the ability to use usb c and usb, so it is very useful….is highly recommend if you are searching for a charger…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a great price
reviews.reviewText: The product comes with three fast wall chargers. The chargers have both USB C and USB A ports. With USB C, I can charge devices real fast and don’t have to wait all day to get it fully charged. New and old devices can be easily charged without a hassle. I love the feature of having both USB ports as I can use the two different types of cable. I use it for iPhone, watch and iPad. I use it for Android devices as well. Works great and highly recommend the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and Solid Quality Little Charger
reviews.reviewText: This is a power packed and versatile little charger. It’s 5 Volt, 3 Amp, and total total 20 watts of power easily charges my Apple Watch, iPhone 14, iPad, and various other devices simultaneously, quickly, and fully. This would be a great bargain for a single unit but it’s an even better one in that you get a total of three units in the deal. This is a must have product for its quality and value. I highly recommend and give it 5 stars all the way around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value And Charges Quickly Via USB C
reviews.reviewText: I saw this deal on Amazon for the Igenjun 3-pack USB C charger blocks and quickly jumped on it. The quality of these charging blocks is great, quickly charging my family's new iPhone 15s via USB C. These are great charger blocks and I would not hesitate to purchase this set again.
